title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.12 - Appeals: time and content
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.12 - Appeals: time and content

State Regulations

The time for deciding an appeal shall commence upon receipt
of a written appeal identifying: (a) the date and location of a request for records; (b) the records that were denied; and
(c) the name and return address
of the appellant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2601.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
